name: torrent-player
description: Video player for popular torrent trackers

scripts.start: cd client && yarn build && cd .. && electron ./electron
scripts.debug: concurrently -n "SERVER,ELECTRON,WEBPACK" -c "black.bold,white,blue.bold" "cd server && yarn start" "electron ./electron/window.js" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.server-debug: concurrently -n "SERVER,WEBPACK" -c "black.bold,blue.bold" "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.server: cd client && yarn build && cd ../server && yarn start
scripts.build: cd client && yarn build && cd .. && electron-builder
